__e: The only reason I came back here was to get rid of Abigail, not to fight some holy war.
Abigail, I don't know what you're doing there, but don't stop.
I kind of get the feeling like Abigail doesn't really like me all that much.
Certainly, you've got a right to know about Abigail and me.
I need to be free enough to have a life with Abigail, and I need you to be okay enough for that to happen, because-- because if you call, I'll come.
Abigail and I were talking and we were thinking since there are two of us and one of you- I mean, there are two of you sort of,
